title: New Client FORCES a Loss In My Series
body:
Not only was I 1-1 to add MORE fuel to the fire, but how am I supposed to deal with this any time the Client just decides "You know what, I feel like handing you an auto-loss right about now." This has happened to my friends as well, but I have yet to experience it up until now. Of course it would also happen to be when I'm in solo queue trying get out of a series, lol.

Riot, please help me out with this.

replies.body: This black screen during champion select is an issue we've been[ following for a few days](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/MihNFhcV-hot-issue-black-screen-during-champion-select-beta-client).  A hotfix went out last night, so everything should be fixed now.  Sorry for the trouble you ran into.  :(  Let me know if you run into any further issues with this.
